DialogueOption.Text: Behind the falls was a vision torch made by an owl-like species that predated the Nomai. The vision showed me them landing on Timber Hearth, ate some of our primitive ancestors, and took off to Dark Bramble before it overgrew.

Dialogue.Page: Son of a Beachum! That makes me sick to my stomach, I'll never eat fish again!
If I were as courageous as you, I'd go to Dark Bramble and see if they left anything behind.
